mapper.sql: id, order_number AS orderNumber, order_date AS orderDate, order_by AS orderBy, status, stock_valid_date AS stockValidDate, deliver_date AS deliverDate, deliver_method AS deliverMethod, deliver_number AS deliverNumber, deliver_amount AS deliverAmount, deliver_coins AS deliverCoins, address_id AS addressId, modified_date AS modifiedDate, modified_by AS modifiedBy, comment
mapper.select:
select a.id id, a.order_number orderNumber, a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.deliver_method deliverMethod, a.deliver_number deliverNumber, a.modified_date modifiedDate, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street, c.memberID memberIDs from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id LEFT JOIN t_member c on a.order_by = c.id where a.status='申请发货'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and c.memberID = #{memberId}
order by a.modified_date DESC

select a.id id, a.order_number orderNumber, a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.deliver_method deliverMethod, a.deliver_number deliverNumber, a.modified_date modifiedDate, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street, c.memberID memberIDs from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id LEFT JOIN t_member c on a.order_by = c.id where a.status='已发货'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and c.memberID = #{memberId}
order by a.modified_date DESC
